body.p: DocBook is a very popular set of tags for describing books, articles, and other prose documents, particularly technical documentation.
A file is considered to be a DocBook 4 document when one of the following conditions are true:

ul.li: The root element name is book or article.
The PUBLIC ID of the document contains the string -//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML.

body.p: The default schema that is used if one is not detected in the DocBook 4 file is docbookxi.dtd and it is stored in /frameworks/docbook/4.5/dtd/.
The default CSS files used for rendering DocBook content in Author mode are stored in /frameworks/docbook/css/.
The default XML catalog, catalog.xml, is stored in /frameworks/docbook/.
